Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Lee's mission log, volume 28.2... I'm stuck behind this box, trapped by the ranged attacks of the guards...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Their attack pattern is incredibly dense with no noticeable weak points... I've no way of escaping...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'For real... Not a single window of opportunity...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "The cover I'm behind is the only box left that can withstand their ammunition...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll be lying if I say that I can get away in one piece this time...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '(Looks up and sighs) ...The data is not optimistic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The ceiling of this tunnel is covered with tin panels in order to block electronic signals...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "With my thermal bullets, I'll be able to light up the panels. But to make the fire spread...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's a gamble! There are a large number of heavy-duty industrial gears above the surfaceâ€”the structure that supports this tunnel must be overloaded.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If the tin panels burn away, I can collapse this structure with a single shot.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "(Fires at the tin panels) Lee's mission log, volume 28.2... Dismiss.", 4: '1'}
